text: Three Steps on Earth () is a 1965 Polish drama movie directed by Jerzy Hoffman and Edward Skórzewski. It stars Irena Orska, Tadeusz Fijewski, Anna Ciepielewska, Ewa Wiśniewska, Ludwik Pak, Mieczysław Czechowicz, Wiesław Michnikowski, Kazimierz Rudzki, Henryk Bąk, Bohdan Ejmont. == Other websites == * Category:1965 drama movies Category:Polish drama movies Category:Movies directed by Jerzy Hoffman Category:Movies directed by Edward Skórzewski
title: Three Steps on Earth
